content: sorbet poncho is a lightweight top-down crochet poncho worked in joined rounds using a simple double_crochet mesh stitch the construction creates a relaxed open fabric with clean corner shaping and an easy drape over the shoulders the neckline is designed to sit wide and may fall slightly off the shoulders this pattern is suitable for confident beginners and works especially well with cotton or cotton-blend yarns gauge is not critical for this design focus on creating a fabric with comfortable drape construction worked top-down in joined rounds do not turn increases occur only at the four corners materials 6 0 mm crochet hook approximately 400 g of #4 worsted weight yarn cotton or cotton blend 3 stitch markers fit one size adjustable by changing the number of rounds worked the starting chain may be adjusted to alter neckline width terminology us crochet terminology is used
